Serialized Form

  • Package com.simcraft.graphics

    • Class com.simcraft.graphics.GameFrame

      class GameFrame extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • currentScreen
          AbstractScreen currentScreen
          The currently active screen (e.g. menu, game, pause) being displayed and updated. Swapped dynamically using the setScreen() method.
        • gameLoopTimer
          Timer gameLoopTimer
          The timer that drives the game loop, triggering updates and rendering at a fixed interval.

  • Package com.simcraft.graphics.screens

    • Class com.simcraft.graphics.screens.AbstractScreen

      class AbstractScreen extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • gameFrame
          GameFrame gameFrame
          The parent GameFrame to which this screen belongs

    • Class com.simcraft.graphics.screens.GameplayScreen

      class GameplayScreen extends AbstractScreen implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • atLevelEnd
          boolean atLevelEnd
          Flag indicating if the player has reached the end of the current level.
        • cinematicWalk
          boolean cinematicWalk
          Flag indicating if a cinematic walk sequence is currently active.
        • currentLevelIndex
          int currentLevelIndex
          The index of the currently loaded level in the LevelLibrary.
        • currentLevelType
          LevelType currentLevelType
          The type of the currently loaded level (TOP_DOWN or SIDE_SCROLLING).
        • fadeOpacity
          float fadeOpacity
          The current opacity of the fade-out overlay (0.0 to 1.0).
        • fadingOut
          boolean fadingOut
          Flag indicating if a fade-out transition is currently in progress.
        • flashTimer
          int flashTimer
          A timer used to control the duration of the damage flash effect.
        • gamePanel
          GamePanel gamePanel
          The panel responsible for rendering the game world.
        • infoPanel
          InfoPanel infoPanel
          The panel displaying game information (score, time, etc.).
        • jumping
          boolean jumping
          Flag indicating if the player character is currently jumping.
        • jumpProgress
          double jumpProgress
          The progress of the current jump animation (0.0 to 1.0).
        • keyStates
          Map<Integer,Boolean> keyStates
          A map storing the current state (pressed or released) of each relevant key.
        • levelTextOpacity
          float levelTextOpacity
          The current opacity of the level name text (0.0 to 1.0).
        • levelWidth
          int levelWidth
          The fixed width of the current level in pixels.
        • nextLevelName
          String nextLevelName
          The name of the next level to be displayed.
        • showLevelText
          boolean showLevelText
          Flag indicating if the level name text should be displayed.

    • Class com.simcraft.graphics.screens.WelcomeScreen

      class WelcomeScreen extends AbstractScreen implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • screenWipeEffect
          HorizontalScreenWipeEffect screenWipeEffect
          An effect that creates a horizontal wipe across the screen, used as a transition to the next screen.

  • Package com.simcraft.graphics.screens.subpanels

    • Class com.simcraft.graphics.screens.subpanels.GamePanel

      class GamePanel extends Subpanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • backgroundTiles
          BufferedImage[] backgroundTiles
          An array of BufferedImage representing the individual tiles that make up the scrolling background. These tiles are drawn repeatedly to create the illusion of a continuous background.
        • enterClassroom
          EnterClassroom enterClassroom
          A special interactive object that, when interacted with, triggers a transition to a classroom level or scene.
        • floatingText
          String floatingText
          Deprecated.
          Use the GamePanel.floatingTexts list to manage multiple floating text notifications. This field is kept for backward compatibility with older code that might still use it.
        • floatingTextFont
          Font floatingTextFont
          The font used for rendering floating text messages.
        • floatingTexts
          List<FloatingText> floatingTexts
          A list to hold and manage multiple FloatingText objects that are currently displayed in the game world. Each object contains its message, position, color, and lifespan.
        • floatingTextStartTime
          long floatingTextStartTime
          Deprecated.
          Use the timestamp stored within FloatingText objects to manage their display duration. This field is kept for backward compatibility with older code.
        • scrollOffset
          int scrollOffset
          The current horizontal scroll offset of the background in pixels. This value determines which part of the potentially larger background is currently visible.
        • teleportArrow
          TeleportArrow teleportArrow
          A special interactive object in the game world that, when interacted with, triggers a teleport action for the player.
        • tileWidth
          int tileWidth
          The width of a single background tile in pixels. This is determined by the width of the first tile in the backgroundTiles array.

    • Class com.simcraft.graphics.screens.subpanels.InfoPanel

      class InfoPanel extends Subpanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • collisionNotificationLabel
          JLabel collisionNotificationLabel
          A label used to display temporary notifications, such as when the player collides with an enemy and loses time.
        • currentNotification
          String currentNotification
          Stores the text of the current notification being displayed.
        • levelLabel
          JLabel levelLabel
          A label that displays the current game level.
        • notificationDisplayStartTime
          long notificationDisplayStartTime
          Stores the timestamp (in milliseconds) when the current notification started being displayed.
        • pauseButton
          JButton pauseButton
          A button that, when clicked, triggers the game pause action.
        • timerLabel
          JLabel timerLabel
          A label that displays the remaining time in the current game session.

    • Class com.simcraft.graphics.screens.subpanels.Subpanel

      class Subpanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • backgroundImage
          BufferedImage backgroundImage
          The BufferedImage representing the background image of this subpanel.
        • backgroundImageFilepath
          String backgroundImageFilepath
          The filepath to the background image for this subpanel.
        • random
          Random random
          A Random number generator instance that can be used by subclasses for various purposes, such as generating random positions or values.
        • sizeInitialized
          boolean sizeInitialized
          A flag to indicate whether the size of the subpanel has been initialized and is valid. This is useful for operations that depend on the panel's dimensions.
